allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Measure-Command { curl.exe -N -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8006/api/v1/chat/stream -H ''Content-Type: application/json'' -d ''@test_hello.json'' | Out-Null } | Select-Object -ExpandProperty TotalSeconds")

Bash(powershell -Command "$start = Get-Date; curl.exe -N -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8007/api/v1/chat/stream -H ''Content-Type: application/json'' -d ''@test_hello.json'' | Out-Null; $end = Get-Date; \($end - $start\).TotalSeconds")
